A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible. Snoke’s purpose was never defined and was setup to be too powerful to die as quickly and carelessly as he did. Kylo has the attitude of a 10 year old boy who just sh*t his pants on the playground. The once respectable Empire/First Order had no identity. Luke\, whom this movie was supposedly centered around\, would’ve had a more important role if he were a tree. Leia is a wizard. Rey is the most powerful Jedi without training to be a Jedi. Yoda’s brief expose was irrelevant to the story. Above all\, lackluster/short-lived action scenes and it felt as if the movie were directed by kids playing with toys during recess... The movie had a few moments of grandeur\, but where it lacked in tradition and empirical relevancy it made up for in cartoony plot lines and inconceivable “WTF just happened” moments. Disappointed is putting it lightly.
